channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Berkshire’s stock presents Buffett with a ‘golden cross’ as his retirement nears
Here are 5 mounting risks that could hurt the S&P 500, according to BofA
Trump special counsel nominee Paul Ingrassia withdraws after racist texts flap
item.description: Ingrassia, in a text chain with other Republicans, reportedly said that he "has a Nazi streak," and that he used an Italian slur for Black people.

item.title: Meta, Blue Owl strike biggest private-credit deal ever to fund AI data center
Trump wants $230 million from DOJ for investigating him: NYT
item.description: President Donald Trump was previously criminally charged in connection with efforts to reverse his 2020 election loss and retaining classified documen...

item.title: L'Oreal shares suffering through worst day in more than a year
Trump idea to buy beef from Argentina will hurt U.S. ranchers, GOP Sen. warns
item.description: Fischer encouraged the Trump administration "to focus on trade deals that benefit our ag producers—not imports that will do more harm than good."

item.title: White House calls Trump ballroom demolition work furor 'manufactured outrage'
item.description: President Donald Trump said in July that construction of his White House ballroom "won't interfere with the current building," referring to the East W...

item.title: Meet the 35-year-old stockpiling $250,000 in nickels as a bet against inflation
Trump Jan. 6 pardon recipient accused of threatening to kill Democratic leader Jeffries
item.description: Christopher Moynihan, of Clinton, is charged with making a terroristic threat against Hakeem Jeffries, the House Minority Leader.
